body_html: I saw that you want to implement stack, unsqueeze and cat for sparse tensors in aten. You will need dimI and dimV information in aten as well. Are _dimI, _dimV, _nnz, and is_coalesced in aten as well (https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/csrc/generic/methods/SparseTensor.cwrap#L74-L108)?
body_text: I saw that you want to implement stack, unsqueeze and cat for sparse tensors in aten.  You will need dimI and dimV information in aten as well. Are _dimI, _dimV, _nnz, and is_coalesced in aten as well (https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/csrc/generic/methods/SparseTensor.cwrap#L74-L108)?
body: I saw that you want to implement `stack`, `unsqueeze` and `cat` for sparse tensors in aten.  You will need dimI and dimV information in aten as well. Are `_dimI`, `_dimV`, `_nnz`, and `is_coalesced` in aten as well (https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/csrc/generic/methods/SparseTensor.cwrap#L74-L108)?
